page.title: 11CUSTOMS.
page.content: An annual Harvest Supper run by the Ladies Social Committee is held in the Village Hall for every resident over l4yrs of age, also a Christmas Party for all the children of the village under l4yrs. Traditionally,Easter, Christmas and Birthdays are celebrated every year. FOX HUNTING This 'sport' is an annual event,the season commencing in September and running on into March.Cornish Hall End comes under the East Essex Hunt,which 'meets' in the village and hunts foxes in surrounding woodland with local farmers consent. WILDLIFE Deer cross regularly near Lt.London, between November & March.Pheasants are numerous,Partridge rare.Grey squirrels can be found in the woods.Hare & rabbit can be seen.Birds abound.
